item.title: Introduction
item.description:
WHY K8S

In micro services, there are tons of container need to be host. We can’t do this by home make script and tools. So we need a container Orchestration tool. That is Kubernetes which offers the following features.

item.title: Architecture
item.description:
Node Processes

Worker Nodes

  • Each Node has multiple Pods on it.
  • Worker Nodes do the actual work.
  • 3 processes must be installed on each Node:
    • Container Runtime (e.g. Docker/Podman)
    • kubelet
    • kube-proxy
